com.facebook.litho.testing

Class ComponentTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.testing.ComponentTestHelper

  • public final class ComponentTestHelper
extends Object
    Helper class to simplify testing of components. Allows simple and short creation of views that are created and mounted in a similar way to how they are in real apps.

        Parameters:
        component - The component builder which to get the subcomponent from

        Returns:

        onVisibleHandler - SpecificComponent.onVisible(component)
